name: Yang You 0001
content: Yang You's Homepage Welcome to Yang You's homepage! I am looking for PhD students, postdocs, and visiting scholars, please email your CV to me if you are interested. Research Interests: Machine Learning High Performance Computing Foundation Models and MultiModal AI Parallel and Distributed Systems Pre-Training, SFT, RL About: Questions Answers Institute National University of Singapore (Computer Science) Position Presidential Young Professor Education PhD in Computer Science (UC Berkeley, 2015-2020) PhD Advisor Prof. James Demmel [dissertation] Industry Experience Google Brain; IBM; Intel; Microsoft; NVIDIA; HPC-AI Tech Google Scholar Link CV Link Academic Family Tree Link Homepage of my lab Link Twitter Follow @YangYou1991 Press link Email yangyou (at) nus (dot) edu (dot) sg Backup Email chinayouyang1991 (at) gmail (dot) com Office Phone (+65) 66-017-698 Phone (+65) 86-488-197
